Well the youtube bug finally bit me. For what it's worth I've uploaded my first youtube video in response to a very good user who is an Atheist and has very inspiring videos.
 
 If your so inclined take a look. The video deals with coming out, and a message to younger teens dealing with suicide to not give in. I'm sure a couple of you here have been wanting to put a face to me for years. Enjoy.
 
 YouTube - I Was Wrong: Response to Philhellenes and It gets better

Um, no, bad idea.
 
 Folks, be very careful about giving any sort of personal info out online in forums like this, no matter what side of the aisle you are on regarding these issues. It's not a smart thing to do; there are some real nutcases out there who tend to be drawn to these sort of forums that allow for ideological extremism. There's nothing courageous about stupidity.
jazyjason

Um, no, bad idea.
 
 Folks, be very careful about giving any sort of personal info out online in forums like this, no matter what side of the aisle you are on regarding these issues. It's not a smart thing to do; there are some real nutcases out there who tend to be drawn to these sort of forums that allow for ideological extremism. There's nothing courageous about stupidity.

 
 Courageous about stupidity? Jyoshu I could personally care less about these crazies you speak of. Any information Ive given as far as location in that Newspaper article is well over 6 years old and dated.
 
 I didn't make this video as a thumbing of my nose to others who oppose my views that's not the point and far from it. 
 
 I made this video to tell my story. My experiences. And if there is one scared teenager, one person with little hope who see's this video and knows there is a light at the end of the tunnel. That they themselves as people are loved for who they truly are and should be, then that is worth all the guff, insults, trolls, and idle threats I receive.
 
 I've already been almost killed for being silent. I'll be damned if I let someone be killed now that I can speak.
jazyjason

Rule number 1: 1. Do not give your name or any personal information that could be used to identify you. Do not request personal information, including age.
 
 
 I am posting this rule to make an observation to the admin on this particular link. My other link to a newspaper was deleted and I understand why.
 
 I am posting this to inform you that in this video I divulge no personal identification to identify me. I give the second part of my handle Jason instead of jazyjason as is also my username on this board.
 
 My name, age, residence, and request for personal info is not given except via youtube users based upon their specific guidelines. In other words I can only talk to youtube users if they so choose and they respond with a handle in a similar manner just like this boards private message function.
 
 Just wanted to cover all the bases here so this thread or link isn't pulled. Thank you.

If I were an openly gay man when I was a teenager/young man my life would have been hell.

 
 And do you not think for a minute that there are others right here, right now suffering that same fate? Do you not think there is some young person scouring the internet searching for answers? All the while the pain, the agony grows inside them?
 
 
 
 
 
 
At worse I would have been rejected completely by my family and at best been tolerated and ridiculed.

 
 How do you think this plays out in middle America? Think of the possibly hundreds or thousands of young people that have suffered, have had their lives ripped apart because of bitter blind prejudice...
 
 These kids need something! They need to see there is hope... For the love of all that is good in this universe can you not see my reasoning for posting and making this video?
 
 
 
I appreciate that you have been subjected to shocking discrimination and violence.

 
 Not just me Gans. I am but one story, one page. One sentence in the volumes of suffering people have endured and continue to endure for who they really are.
 
 
I also think that you have the right to tell the world about it....but you are using megaphone tactics on this small forum.
 You are getting off on it ..and it shows.

 
 Gans perhaps a megaphone is needed this time. perhaps in this case with these people they need someone to yell out your OK. Need some hope, something to cling to!
 
 How can you dare say I am getting off on this video? Do you not realize the conflict in my mind I went through to finally post my story? It was not in some display of self gratification or righteous pomp! 
 
 It was so that kids JUST like me have hope! Have something to find! You don't understand and will never understand just how fragile these young people are...
 
 And how they can endure only so much pain before they choose to end their world. Another light snuffed out by the darkness of hatred and ignorance Gans.... Please I beg of you to see this for what it truly is...

The Holy Spirit also gives the born again believer a continuing desire to tell others about Christ and his salvation.

These are just two of the evidences of the Spirit.
